title: EVM log conversion in Blockchain
summary:
I need your permission to write to the file. Could you please grant permission to edit `/Users/williamcory/chop/src/core/blockchain.zig`?

The changes I want to make are:

1. Add a `convertLogs` function that converts EVM logs to the displayable format
2. Add a `formatU256Hex` helper function to format topics as hex strings
3. Call `convertLogs` in `executeCall` instead of returning an empty `&.{}`
